title: Could be better
comment: Please for the love of god a /ignore function is desperately needed.

title: Good, but...
comment: Perfect, apart from one thing: it sometimes lags when trying to join a channel on an SSL enabled server. I'm not sure if this is just an issue with SSL servers only as I only use the app for one server. Which uses SSL. That said, this is otherwise hands down the best Android IRC app.
automatically goes to new window on new pvt msg. also timestamps not supports years,month,day.

title: Good UI update but..
comment: Keyboard Enter key bug still not fixed. Please do fix it. I stopped using this app because of that (and the lack of / commands support). Otherwise awesome app!
Good work

title: The best Android irc client
comment: Yaaic has all the essential features I need in an irc client. It is easy to set up and the automatic identification of your nic works. The UI has a neat and simple design which is intuitive and which presents multiple channels well on small screens. It is also open source.

title: No server username support.
comment: Can't connect to my bouncer. Useless.

title: Big Servers
comment: ANDChat and Yaaic are the only clients that don't crash on channels with a very large population; like MMO servers. It may lack some features, but I love the simple UI and how fast it runs on my phone.
Good program, seems to be abandoned though.

title: some scandinavian characters do not work
comment: Very good. Only problem is that scandinavian characters (öäå) are not displayed correctly. Character set is UTF-8 and if someone is writing with different character set, characters are not displayed right. Maybe it's possible to make some conversion table?

title: hard to evaluate
comment: this works reliably enough for what it CAN do, but functionality wise it's incapable of doing what I actually need it for. After getting a search result from a bot, it's not possible to select within the text received in order to copy and paste it in channel, which renders it pretty much useless to me :(

title: Outdated
comment: This app was abandoned and forked by another Dev into Atomic.  You can get atomic through F droid.

Great

title: Nearly perfect
comment: This is a fantastic IRC chat app. Clean and thoughtfully-designed user interface that is intuitive and doesn't get in your way, and supports just about all the features I use. Only thing I wish it had was the ability to automatically select from among multiple servers and ports (mainly because some FreeNode servers don't work on my employer's firewalled WiFi network).
Best irc client on play store. Would bang again.

title: Basics work, not updated anymore?
comment: The basics work great, however a few features are still needed (see other comments). Since the last update happened two years ago I slightly doubt we will see one in the near future

title: Some issues....
comment: No ignore feature. Autocompletion won't work capitalized, and speaking of, most phones nowadays do not have a search key to use the autocomplete feature. Search keys are so 2009 so please fix that? And I agree the auto scroll down when someone posts is annoying but I suppose this was an attempt to fix the old issue of the box getting stuck on old lines so it appears there is no conversation occurring? Good client otherwise just needs some final brushing at this point.

title: elle

title: One of the better irc clients for Android

title: Simply the best

title: Works great
comment: I downloaded a different IRC android app before downloading this one, but every 2 minutes I would be ping'd out no matter what my settings were. This one is quick and easy, but not a lot of options to toy around with like logs and color edit (while chatting, I could care less about the bg color, it's already black the way I like it). I also love the fact that even when I'm kicked out, I can see the last conversation when I rejoin.

title: Well done
comment: This is a great irc client.   Lean, intuitive, fast and doesn't use more permissions than it needs.   Def recommend

title: Missing Features

title: Something is missing..
comment: Well, this would have been a 5 stars rating, as Yaaic is one of the fastest and easiest way to chat on IRC server via Android. But I found out that something is missing. If you're an op, unless you know by heart the irc command (/mode #chan etc), you cannot change settings of your chan, even the topic. This is lame, this is the only thing that is missing... Besides that, if you're not admin or op, this is a very practical app to chat on IRC.

title: Needs one simple fix
comment: I've found it necessary to change my rating of this otherwise-wonderful IRC client from five to three stars.  With the new update, the chat-box autoscrolls to the bottom of the page (i.e most recently sent message) every time a user types a message, making it next-to-impossible to scroll through the history of a busy room.  PLEASE fix this.  This has been my IRC client for nearly half a year and the new update frustrates me to no end.
